content: p33 stitches and place marker the beginning of 36 39 sts pm to indicate start of instep the round is now the middle of the heel flap p33 36 39 sts place instep stitches on holder work set-up for heel flap round 1 decrease round knit to last 3 stitches before first instep marker k2tog set up for heel flap k1 work instep stitches in pattern as small k3 ssk k2tog k7 ssk k2tog k7 established to second instep marker slip ssk k2tog k3 slip 1 wyif turn 27 sts marker k1 ssk knit to end of round medium k6 k2tog k8 ssk k2tog k8 ssk round 2 knit around as established k5 slip 1 wyif turn 32 sts pattern stitches on instep and stockinette large k6 k2tog k9 ssk k2tog k9 ssk on sole k6 slip 1 wyif turn 35 sts repeat these two rounds until 60 68 76 stitches remain heel will be worked over 27 32 35 sts 33 36 39 instep sts/27 32 37 sole sts place remaining 33 36 39 sts on a holder for instep heel flap is worked back and foot continue working as established forth pattern on instep and stockinette on the sole until foot measures approximately 1 eye of partridge with garter stitch border 3/4 2 2 1/4 inches less than desired foot row 1 wrong side k1tbl k2 purl across length ending on round 12 of chart b to last 3 sts k2 slip 1 wyif turn row 2 k1tbl k2 *k1 slip 1 repeat from * note it is important to end on round 12 of to last 4 5 4 sts ending with k3 4 3 chart b foot may be shorter than above slip 1 wyif turn measurements row 3 k1tbl k2 purl across to last 3 sts k2 slip 1 wyif turn set-up for toe knit to first instep marker row 4 k1tbl k3 *k1 slip1 repeat from * small k3 ssk k2tog k7 ssk k2tog k7 to last 5 4 5 sts ending with k4 3 4 ssk k2tog k4 27 instep sts slip 1 wyif turn medium k6 k2tog k8 ssk k2tog k8 ssk repeat row 1-4 until heel flap measures 2 k6 32 instep sts 1/4 inches or desired length ending on row large k17 ssk k2tog k18 37 instep sts 2 or 4 pm to indicate new beginning of round 27 32 37 instep sts/27 32 37 sole sts turn heel row 1 slip 1 p 15 18 19 p2tog p1 turn knit even until foot measures 1 1/2 1 3/4 row 2 slip 1 k6 7 6 ssk k1 turn 2 inches less than desired foot length row 3 slip 1 p7 8 7 p2tog p1 turn begin toe row 4 slip 1 k8 9 8 ssk k1 turn continue working one more stitch until all the stitches have been worked you should toe end on a knit row with 17 20 21 stitches decrease round k1 ssk knit across to
